# C2M2_ER_diagrams

Graphics depicting C2M2 entity-relationship models
(or just an entity model, in the simplest case),
illustrating metadata richness levels.


## Full C2M2 ER Model

|![Full model diagram](../C2M2_ER_diagrams/full-C2M2-ER-model.png "Full model diagram")|


## Level 0 C2M2 ER Model

|![Level 0 model diagram](../C2M2_ER_diagrams/level-0-C2M2-model.png "Level 0 model diagram")|


## Level 1 C2M2 ER Model

|![Level 1 model diagram](../C2M2_ER_diagrams/level-1-C2M2-model.png "Level 1 model diagram")|


## Level 2 C2M2 ER Model

|![Level 2 model diagram](../C2M2_ER_diagrams/level-2-C2M2-model.png "Level 2 model diagram")|
